'''Special Furnishing Gift (I)''' is a quest reward during {{Quest|A Cloud-Sea Appeal, a Brilliance Revealed (Quest)}}.

Depending on the dialogue choice during the quest, it is automatically exchanged for one of the furnishings:
* {{Item|"The Title of Champion Is Mine!"}}
* {{Item|"Help!!!"}}
* {{Item|"N-No Way!"}}
